title: 现在你们基本上用什么光影配材质
author: xiaotianzhilang
txt_content: 我也想整套好点的，但总感觉有些材质和光影不对我的胃口

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 我不用光影，因为设备太垃圾了

replies.author: Knight丶夏末
replies.txt_content: 我都是用一段时间再换

replies.author: Jaanai
replies.txt_content:
光影chocapic
材质方纹淡彩/梦境森林/原版高清

replies.author: 凋灵斯拉
replies.txt_content: 我用"丢失的材质"（其实就是电脑渣，卡出的）

replies.author: xiaotianzhilang
replies.txt_content:
Litttle_fish 发表于 2020-2-28 15:37
Sildur's Vibrant shaders +原版材质
就没好点的材质？？？

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: YonderVoice
replies.txt_content:
光影用sildurs shaders 1.25版本开始自带TAA抗锯齿 配置要求低效果也不错
材质可以用这个https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-853240-1-1.html
